modName: Vampire Daywalker Armor - A Vampiric Thirst Addon
summary: An Armor that affords protection from the sun to any creature that fears its rays.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][size=6]UPDATE: VERSION 2 REMOVES AZRAN AND DISCIPLES FROM THE SOULCAIRN AND IS NOT BASED ON AN ENCHANTED ARMOR TO GIVE PROTECTION ANYMORE. YOU CAN NOW STAY SAFE IN THE SUN AS LONG AS YOU HAVE YOUR HEAD, BODY, HANDS AND FEET COVERED BY ANY ARMOR/CLOTHING (OR COMBINATION OF BOTH) THAT YOU LIKE. YOU WILL SUFFER WAITING AND SPEECH DEBUFFS BUT YOU WILL NOT BURN. THIS SHOULD WORK WITH ANY CLOTHING OR ARMOR MODS. ENJOY[/size][/size]




[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/86869-0-1506033618.png[/img]


[youtube]u1AUAPxSErc[/youtube]
author: plozaq

files.name: Daywalker - A Vampiric Thirst Addon v2.0
